notes.title: Companion
notes.content:
# Companion: Huginn
### Imp

## Attack
+5 to hit, 1d4 + 3 piercing damage

3d6 damage, or half on a successful DC 11 CON saving throw

## Stats and Modifiers

### Stuff
#### Initiative: 

+3
#### Proficiency Bonus:

 +2
HP: 8/10
| stat          | score          | mod          |
| -------- | -------- | -------- |
| STR | 6 | -2 |
| DEX | 17 | +3 |
| CON | 13 | +1 |
| INT | 11 | 0 |
| WIS | 12 | +2 |
| CHA | 14 | +2 |

## Skills
Deception, Insight, Persuasion, Stealth

## Features
**Resistance:** cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical/silver weapons

**Immunity** Fire, poison

**Condition Immunity** poisoned

**Languages** Infernal, Common

## Traits
**Invisibility** can turn invisible as action (until attacks or concentration ends)

**Shapechanger** can become a rat, raven, or spider

**Magic Resistance** adv. on saving throw vs magic

notes.title: Book of Misspells
notes.content:
# Misspells
- Massage 
- Mage Armoire 
- Hold Person ?
- Speak With Dad 
- Ick Storm - calls sludge down in 20 foot radius, range is 300 feet
- Telepoot  - really loud fart sound where 
- Wash 
- Friarball  - shoots a friar 
- Magic Rissole - creates 3 balls of food

notes.title: Invocations
notes.content:
# Invocations

### Agonizing Blast
Add CHA modifier to damage of eldritch blast

### Voice of the Chain Master
You can communicate telepathically with your familiar and perceive through your familiar's senses as long as you are on the same plane of existence. Additionally, while perceiving through your familiar's senses, you can also speak through your familiar in your own voice, even if your familiar is normally incapable of speech.

### Mask of Many Faces
You can cast Disguise Self at will, without expending a spell slot.

notes.title: Status
notes.content:
# Status
## Exhaustion
1 level

Disadvantage on ability checks

abilities.name: Fey Presence
abilities.description: As an action, you can cause each creature in a 10-foot cube originating from you to make a Wisdom saving throw against your warlock spell save DC. The creatures that fail their saving throws are all charmed or frightened by you (your choice) until the end of your next turn.

abilities.name: Misty Escape
abilities.description: Starting at 6th level, you can vanish in a puff of mist in response to harm. When you take damage, you can use your reaction to turn invisible and teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. You remain invisible until the start of your next turn or until you attack or cast a spell.

features.name: Fey Ancestry
features.description: adv. on saving throws vs charmed, magic cannot put you to sleep
